Maxed Monsters?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Maxed Monsters?
By verystrait42 on Monday, May 11, 2009 - 06:37 pm:

What is the highest amount of stats anyone has maxed on one monster without using the Nevertired method? I just got an enma to 999 power and Acc., all other stats on the -500 side. Was 3 yrs 11 months at that time of the retirement message. Is it possible to max 3 stats without the nevertired method?

By verystrait42 on Thursday, May 14, 2009 - 04:25 pm:

Nevermind this question, just did it with a pure hare. 999 Power, speed and accuracy. Is it possible to 4?

By Infernus on Friday, May 15, 2009 - 03:46 pm:

I just checked my freezer, and I still have monsters with five stats completely maxxed and the sixth being very close.

I'm pretty sure I, and a couple others (I seem to recall Gizmo the Lemur mentioning it), managed to completely maxx a monster or two without the Nevertired Method.

Keep going the way you have been, refine your method, and it should come.

Short answer: Yes.
